thread.title: Monchi's method: The soccer man everyone wants in Europe
thread.title_full: Monchi's method: The soccer man everyone wants in Europe - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Tales Azzoni, Ap Sports Writer
title: Monchi's method: The soccer man everyone wants in Europe
text: Photo: Miguel Angel Morenatti, AP In this Thursday, Oct. 6, 2011 photo, Ramon Rodriguez Verdejo "Monchi" poses for a photo at the Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan stadium, in Seville, Spain. Verdejo, who still goes by the nickname from his goalkeeping days, has become one of the most sought-after football directors in European soccer after revolutionizing Spanish club Sevilla with a scouting system that helped rescue the team from the brink of financial collapse and turned it into a perennial contender in the continent’s second-tiered competitions. In this Thursday, Oct. 6, 2011 photo, Ramon Rodriguez Verdejo... MADRID (AP) — He's known as Monchi. And his method for evaluating soccer talent has Europe's attention. In this Thursday, Oct. 6, 2011 photo, Ramon Rodriguez Verdejo "Monchi" poses for a photo at the Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan stadium, in Seville, Spain. Verdejo, who still goes by the nickname from his goalkeeping days, has become one of the most sought-after football directors in European soccer after revolutionizing Spanish club Sevilla with a scouting system that helped rescue the team from the brink of financial collapse and turned it into a perennial contender in the continent’s second-tiered competitions. In this Thursday, Oct. 6, 2011 photo, Ramon Rodriguez Verdejo... MADRID (AP) — He's known as Monchi. And his method for evaluating soccer talent has Europe's attention.
